title: Archaeological Rest House
descriptions: The location makes it completely worthwhile. Tk1400 for a 2 person room with AC. Fan rooms were also available, The room was basic but clean, mosquito nets were provided over the beds. Attached bathroom had a western style. The rest house is actually within the limits of the archaeological site (Somapura Vihara) you are not restricted to visiting only within the opening hours. You will get up at sunrise and have the ruins to the morning mist which was really magical. The caretaker lady can provide a homecooked dinner and it is very tasty. Breakfast at the restaurant in the village.Note that you need to buy entrance tickets for the vihara/museum in addition to the room charge.

title: Red Chillies Restaurant and Guest house
descriptions: SiesTa Hotel and Convention in Bogra city center offers picturesque views archological ancient site and discover Northern Bangladesh. SiesTa is the first upper upscale business boutique star hotel and convention in the city, which is the largest rooftop swimming pool hotel in North Bengal. Because the hotel is located in entrance secure place in front Jahangirabad Cantonments beside Transcom-Pepsi- Prothom alo plant and behind Open University-BADC. Guests are within walking distance of Asian highway circle Banani and International Sheed Chandu Cricket Stadium. Business travelers appreciate the exclusive Business Class Lounge, as well as amenities like free high-speed, wireless Internet. When it's time to relax, the SiesTa makes it easy with a circular rooftop swimming pool, a pool Café & BBQ, Shisha bar and a spa. In addition, each room and suite includes contemporary furnishings, lavish bath amenities and a complimentary breakfast. With two different restaurants and shisha bar serving everything from Chinese/ Thai /Indian / Continental favorites and Bangladeshi dishes to refreshing cocktails and freshly pressed juice, patrons never run out of dining options. Our hotel also boasts the largest pillar less 02 banquet and 1100 capacity convention facility along 02 conference & meeting hall, 1 Board meeting room in Bogra for business and social events.
district: Sherpur Road, Near PTI Hotel SiesTa Bogra, Bogra, Bangladesh

title: Hotel Mrigoya Premium
descriptions: Dinajpur is highly rich with natural resources which attrack to touriest. For touriest here is availabel 5 start hotel and restaurent. Trips Made Easier & More Flexible. Easy to Plan and Book. Intuitive Trip Planning Allows You to Get More Travel with Less Stress. 1 Million Properties. 24/7 Customer Support. Compare & Save. Secure Booking

title: Hotel Naz Garden
descriptions: Naz Garden, have around 100 rooms of various standards. Leaving behind an enormous selection of rooms we, at Naz Garden, have a wide selection of food outlets providing Continental, Bangladeshi, Indian, Thai and Chinese cuisines. We have 8 food outlets in Naz Garden, which are spread according to the ambience of the surrounding. Swimming Pools, Gymnasium, Bar, Banquet, Conference hall, Ball Room, Lake, WIFI Hotspot Internet Access and many more are the main attraction of Naz Garden.
district: Bogra By-Pass Highway Silimpur, Bogra, Bangladesh

title: Parjatan Motel
descriptions: Parjatan Motel, 17th number Five Star Hotel In Bangladesh, 151 Rooms, Two Swimming Pool, Gym, Banquet, Specialized Board Meeting Hall , Kids Zone, Multi Cuisine Restaurant, Concierge, Tour Management, Transportation, Suite, Watch Tower, Lobby, Lobby Cafe, Car parking , River Tour, Tent Tour etc.

title: Hotel Nilanjona Kuakata
descriptions: Hotel Nilanjona is situated at opposite of Rakhain Mohila Market or beside the Agrani Bank, Kuakata. Total Number of rooms in This Hotel is 50. There are six types of rooms are available at Hotel Nilanjona. These are Family bed (Couple + Single), Couple bed, Twin bed and Single bed. All types of room have AC and Non AC facilities.Hotel Nilanjona has a well-decorated conference room with the capacity of 150 persons. They can arrange sound systems and other accessories for conference hall. Hotel Nilanjona has fully air conditioned Restaurant facilitates named as “Dining”. They are able to provide delicious food items at reasonable price. Check in time is 11:30am and checkout time from hotel Nilanjona is at 12:00pm.
district: Kuakata sea beach Road Opposite of Rakhaine Market, Kuakata Bangladesh

title: Popular hotels
descriptions: Situated on the beachfront and offering a 24-hour front desk, Hotel Sea Crown is located just 1.5 km from the famous Sugandha Beach. Free WiFi access is available. Each air-conditioned room here will provide you with a seating area and work desk. Featuring a shower, private bathroom comes with free toiletries. At Hotel Sea Crown you will find a garden. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a tour desk and luggage storage. The property offers free parking. The property is located just 3 km from the scenic Laboni Beach and 4.1 km from Buddhist Temple and the popular Cox's Bazar. The Cox's Bazar Airport and Cox's Bazar Bus Station are located within 4.8 km.The guests can enjoy their meals at the in-house restaurant and refreshing alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages at the bar. Room service is available for 24-hour.

title: Hotel Singapore
descriptions: Conveniently situated in the Khulna part of Khulna, this property puts you close to attractions and interesting dining options. Don't leave before paying a visit to the famous Jessore Airport. As an added bonus, restaurant is provided on-site to conveniently serve your needs. The hotel room rate is less than offered by you. Received payment receipt as per hotel room rate, not as booked through you. This has been financial losses to me as I am unable to reimburse total rent paid for.
